Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 78th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Injured on 4/2/2015 with a Strained Back, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/26/2015...

Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2016...
Released by San Francisco on 4/1/2018...

Released by Houston on 8/9/2018...
